# The Synthesis of Larvicidal Silver Nanoparticles
To obtain my University Diploma of Technology ([DUT](https://www.letudiant.fr/etudes/btsdut/des-dut-aux-but-le-point-sur-le-nouveau-bachelor-universitaire-de-technologie.html)) in Organic and Synthesis Chemistry at the Université Paris-Est Créteil, I had the opportunity to do a 3 month internship in Recife, Brazil at the Universidade Federale de Pernambouco in Departement of Fundamental Chemistry under Marcello Navarro's tutoring. 
This is a [poster](https://martinbagar.github.io/documents/poster_stage-bresil.pdf) I made for my internship in Brazil, in the Universidade Federal de Pernambouco (Recife).
